title: Additional Manuscripts
note: PERIOD = 1 set arbitrarily / couple Add MS dated BCE / See BL Caribbean guide: https://www.bl.uk/collection-guides/caribbean-collections / See M. A. E. Nickson, J. Conway, *The British Library : guide to the catalogues and indexes of the Department of Manuscripts* [London, British Library, 1998] 3 ed OCLC = http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/906817815 / See *Index of Manuscripts in the British Library* [Cambridge, Chadwyck-Healey, 1984–xxx] 10 vols OCLC = http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/11027316 / Eg Add MS 45112: https://discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/details/r/N13730820 / Possibly see Royal Commission on Historical Manuscripts, *Guides to sources for British history* [London, HMSO, 1982–xxx] 12 vols, vol 5 = *Private papers of British colonial governors 1782–1900*, OCLC = xxx
